title.content: Can you sort these clues out so all of the children are happy and work out who is going to the best partner for Steve's partner in the three-legged race?

clue1.content: "I've hurt my hand," said Joe, "I can't go in the egg and spoon race now!"

clue2.content: "Why am I in the sprint?" Asked Ollie, "My hand is steady as a rock!"

clue3.content: "What is a skipping race anyway?" Wailed Pete; "I'm the fastest runner in the class!"

clue4.content: "The sack race is just stupid," Bella complained. "The bags feel awful."

clue5.content: Maddy was sad when the teacher said she had been picked for the three-legged race. She thought she was good at jumping.
